price: Куч-қудратига ишониб, юз ўгирди ва: «Бу сеҳргар ёки мажнун», деди.
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fatawallā biruk'nihi waqāla sāḥirun aw majnūnun
